entities.description: Any type of firearm, including unstated types, automatic, and rifle.
A type of firearm specifically classified as a handgun, including automatic handguns.
A type of firearm specifically classified as a rifle, including automatic rifles.
A type of firearm specifically classified as a shotgun, including automatic shotguns.
A weapon classified as a knife or other cutting instrument.
A weapon classified as a blunt object.
A weapon classified as a motor vehicle or vessel.
Includes use of hands, feet, and other body parts as weapons.
A weapon classified as poison, including gas.
A weapon classified as an explosive device.
A weapon classified as a fire or incendiary device.
Includes drugs, narcotics, and sleeping pills used as weapons.
Using methods of asphyxiation as a weapon.
Includes BB guns, pellet guns, Tasers, pepper spray, stun guns, and other types not specifically listed.
General data about the survey, including minimum and maximum values and missing data.
The unweighted frequency for each weapon type used.
The percentage that represents each weapon type from the total cases.

relationships.description: Classifies a firearm as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies a handgun as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies a rifle as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies a shotgun as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies a knife or cutting instrument as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies a blunt object as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies a motor vehicle or a vessel as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies personal weapons like hands, feet, etc., as weapons used in the survey data.
Classifies poison, including gas, as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies explosives as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies fire or incendiary devices as a type of weapon used in the survey data.
Classifies drugs, narcotics, and sleeping pills as weapons used in the survey data.
Classifies asphyxiation methods as weapons used in the survey data.
Includes other weapon types like BB guns, pellet guns, etc., in the survey data.
Indicates instances where no weapon was used in the survey data.
Associates the unweighted frequency with each weapon type.
Associates the percentage representation with each weapon type.
